CustomField.formula: IF( Client_Health_Score__c >= 90,IMAGE("/resource/CH_Happiest", "Happiest HM",30,30), IF( Client_Health_Score__c >= 70,IMAGE("/resource/CH_Happy", "Happy HM",30,30), IF( Client_Health_Score__c >= 50,IMAGE("/resource/CH_Neutral", "Neutral HM",30,30), IF( Client_Health_Score__c >= 20,IMAGE("/resource/CH_Unhappy", "Unhappy HM",30,30), IF( Client_Health_Score__c >= 0,IMAGE("/resource/CH_Mad", "Mad HM",30,30), IMAGE("/resource/CH_Unknown", "Unknown",30,30) )))))
CustomField.label: Client Health
